[vc_row cms_row_overflow=”row-overflow-unset” css=”.vc_custom_1657904558638{margin-bottom: 52px !important;}”][vc_column width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”1699″ img_size=”full” el_class=”box-overlay-left”][cms_space space_lg=”11″ space_md=”40″ space_sm=”40″ space_xs=”45″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”7/12″][cms_heading text=”We pledge to provide reliable and high-quality services that meet all of your needs.” title_font_size=”43px” title_line_height=”57px” cms_template=”cms_heading.php” el_class=”close-spacing”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1678595590746{margin-top: 10px !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1555314845773{padding-left: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1678595445689{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]

Newlane Logistics is a well-respected logistics provider that offers a wide range of services in customs clearing and international shipping. Our team is dedicated to helping you navigate the complexities of international trade and ensure smooth and efficient transportation of your goods.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1678595357463{margin-bottom: 21px !important;}”]

Our commitment to using technology helps us provide customized, tech-based solutions for our customers, making us true partners in their success. At our company, we strive to use the latest and most innovative technologies to streamline and improve our services, providing value and convenience for our clients.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1678596165733{margin-top: 63px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1657913740278{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1678530817486{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: #c4273a !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2003″][cms_heading text=”Our Mission” tag=”h4″ text_color=”#ffffff” cms_template=”cms_heading–layout3.php”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1678528486723{margin-top: 20px !important;}”]

Our goal is to continually improve and streamline our services in order to provide efficient, sustainable logistics solutions that will enhance the value of your business. We are constantly working to find new and innovative ways to support your needs.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1678530834968{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 46px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: #c4273a !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2002″][cms_heading text=”Our Vision” tag=”h4″ text_color=”#ffffff” cms_template=”cms_heading–layout3.php”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1678529093096{margin-top: 20px !important;}”]

At Newlane, we are dedicated to meeting our obligations and earning a reputation for exceptional customer service. We are committed to delivering the best possible experience for our clients.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs” css=”.vc_custom_1678530118220{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1658411610960{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1658494074446{margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-top: 15px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”1895″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1658469392995{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-top-width: 3px !important;border-right-width: 3px !important;border-bottom-width: 3px !important;border-left-width: 3px !important;border-left-color: #585858 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #585858 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #585858 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #585858 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1658469129272{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1658412198570{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]

Pramod Dhamdhere

Pramod has been into the industry for +30 years and has wealth of knowledge in respect of shipping & consolidations. He has worked for largest forwarder in past and has great drive and determination to keep the business moving forward. He possesses organisational skills and has talent of procuring best rates and services from the partners.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1658469226981{margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-top: 15px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”1900″ img_size=”full” el_class=”leader-img” css=”.vc_custom_1658469428091{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-top-width: 3px !important;border-right-width: 3px !important;border-bottom-width: 3px !important;border-left-width: 3px !important;border-left-color: #585858 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #585858 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #585858 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #585858 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1658469135314{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1658412206998{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]

Pranav Dhamdhere

Pranav has completed managerial studies and working in the capacity of sales and IT. He possesses strong skills in business and management as well overgrowing portfolio of clients. Pranav is passionate about information and technology and expect great things in future.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1658410923477{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1658469025743{margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-top: 15px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”1898″ img_size=”full” el_class=”leader-img” css=”.vc_custom_1658469436773{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-top-width: 3px !important;border-right-width: 3px !important;border-bottom-width: 3px !important;border-left-width: 3px !important;border-left-color: #585858 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #585858 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #585858 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #585858 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1658469140718{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1658412213025{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]

Brahma Patil

Brahma has been in this industry for +15 years and worked for the largest forwarder and consolidator in the past. He has been leading the operation team as well pricing and always on top for customer satisfaction solving issues and queries. Brahma carries important role in our commercial strategy and team development.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1658469031608{margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-top: 15px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”1901″ img_size=”full” el_class=”leader-img” css=”.vc_custom_1658469445298{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-top-width: 3px !important;border-right-width: 3px !important;border-bottom-width: 3px !important;border-left-width: 3px !important;border-left-color: #585858 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #585858 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #585858 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #585858 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1658469147966{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1658412220894{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]

Prathamesh Avasarkar

Prathamesh possesses in-depth knowledge of sales, operation and pricing. He has been in this industry for +10 years and have worked with consolidator and freight forwarder. Prathamesh attitude is to never say ‘no’ and keep driving and acquiring right clients and partners for the business.
